title: Stretching Exercises for Bedtime - Relaxing Routine before Sleep or Anytime to Feel Better
description:
The best way to end a long day is with bedtime stretches. Whether you are felling sore or didn’t get a chance to workout you will feel relaxed and rejuvenated after these exercises.

These stretches will feel great anytime of day, but are formulated for and especially effective in promoting restful sleep.  

Put on your pajamas and join me on the mat, a soft rug, or even your bed. 

Thank you for working out with me. 

Goodnight and sleep tight 😴 

Products and I use and recommend can be found here:
https://www.amazon.com/shop/seniorshapefitness
as an Amazon associate/influencer I earn from qualifying purchases 

Join SeniorShape on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/SeniorShapefitness/
channelDescription:
Hello and welcome to SeniorShape with Lauren! I’m thrilled you have found my channel! I am an ACE (American Council on Exercise) certified fitness instructor. I also hold a specialization in senior fitness. 
It is my passion to create fun, new exercises and routines that are never boring. 
My videos are easy to follow and the exercises featured are specifically curated for beginners, and active older adults. The workouts are challenging and at a great pace that works well for anyone. 
Please subscribe so you never miss a new workout.

Equipment I use or recommend can be purchased on my Amazon store page www.amazon.com/shop/seniorshapefitness
*as an Amazon associate/influencer I earn from qualifying purchases

For those who have graciously asked to donate so I can continue to provide free videos can contribute through 
Venmo: @SeniorShape
I appreciate your support!

Thanks for working out with me!
Lauren

comments: Nice ! I have waited all day to do this stretch and it accomplished exactly what it was meant to do... stress release and feeling relaxed !!! Thank you again for a great video !!!
the music you chose for this video is just delightful
I love this one.   I keep coming back to it when I’m tired.

Lauren, I want to tell you a little story. I was recently visiting my 8-year-old granddaughter in California. Her parents are going through a divorce and things have been a little topsy turvy for her, alternating one week with Dad and one week with Mom. At bedtime my son had been letting her do some rough housing thinking it was a way for her to burn off some energy, but , of course, it had just the opposite effect. I suggested we all do your bedtime stretches instead. Well it calmed her down and she was able to go to bed without the usual hoopla. They have continued to do these stretches every night and bedtime has become a pleasure rather than a chore. So even though your channel is “Senior Shape” this video at least has brought some calm to a little girl and her dad during an otherwise stressful situation. You are so appreciated. ❤
My kids (son, 7 and daughter, 11) have been joining me for this stretch routine lately. We do it at bedtime and love how relaxing it is. Thank you so much!
